The Lost Vikings.name: Spin To Win!
The Lost Vikings.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

The Lost Vikings.name: Nordic Attack Squad
The Lost Vikings.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

The Lost Vikings.name: Viking Bribery
The Lost Vikings.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

The Lost Vikings.name: Play Again!
The Lost Vikings.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

The Lost Vikings.name: Longboat Raid!
The Lost Vikings.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

The Lost Vikings.name: Viking Hoard
The Lost Vikings.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.

The Lost Vikings.name: Go Go Go!
The Lost Vikings.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

The Lost Vikings.name: Select Olaf
The Lost Vikings.description: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown.  Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

The Lost Vikings.name: Select Baleog
The Lost Vikings.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

The Lost Vikings.name: Select Erik
The Lost Vikings.description: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

The Lost Vikings.name: Select All Vikings
The Lost Vikings.description: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

1.name: Olaf the Stout
1.description: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Spy Games
1.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

1.name: Explosive Attacks
1.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

1.name: Viking Bribery
1.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

4.name: Pain Don't Hurt
4.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

4.name: Erik the Swift
4.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.name: It's a Sabotage!
4.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 10 seconds, causing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Baleog the Fierce
7.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

7.name: Spin To Win!
7.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Norse Force!
7.description: All Vikings gain a 110 (+4% per level) to 220 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

10.name: Longboat Raid!
10.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

10.name: Play Again!
10.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

13.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
13.description: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Jump!
13.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Nordic Attack Squad
13.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

16.name: Large and In Charge
16.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
16.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

16.name: 64 KB Marathon
16.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
20.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

20.name: Checkpoint Reached
20.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

20.name: The Sequel!
20.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.
